results.description: Select cash-rich firms with stable cash flows to reduce downside. SUGGESTION1 applied; fields adequate coverage. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Short-Term Reversal Filtered by Sentiment: negative 5-day industry-relative return with high investor sentiment rank
results.description: Short-term mean-reversion candidates that remain unpopular may rebound; filter using investor sentiment. SUGGESTION1 applied; sentiment module cov high. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Growth Surprise with Low Forecast Uncertainty: surprise / FY2 dispersion
results.description: Prefer earnings surprises where forecast dispersion is low to avoid noisy signals. SUGGESTION1 applied; fields high coverage. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Volume-Price Momentum Spike: visibility ratio × 39-week return
results.description: High visibility and long-run return in same direction signals robust momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both fields high userCount. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Earnings Quality × Low Inventory Risk: high earnings quality with falling inventory ratio
results.description: Combine high earnings quality with improving inventory metrics to spot operational fixes. SUGGESTION1 applied; fields have good coverage. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Momentum with Low Option Spread: 6m return divided by bid-ask spread-to-price
results.description: Avoid momentum in names with wide bid-ask spreads that increase trading cost. SUGGESTION1 applied; spread field cov high. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: FCF Growth × Low Depreciation Surprise: 1-yr FCF growth with low unexpected depreciation change
results.description: Firms growing FCF without unexpected depreciation swings are higher quality. SUGGESTION1 applied; applied ts_backfill on udep if coverage lower. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Momentum with Earnings Revision Confirmation: 6m return × 3-month FY1 revision
results.description: Confirm momentum with contemporaneous analysts' upward revisions to reduce false signals. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both fields high coverage/userCount. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Low Leverage Growth: rising operating cash flow to assets with low book leverage
results.description: High operating cash flow relative to assets and low leverage indicates safer growth. SUGGESTION1 applied with fields of good coverage. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Value Momentum via Analyst Composite: QVA value composite times 6m alpha
results.description: Use analyst-derived value composite combined with medium-term momentum for validated picks. SUGGESTION1 applied; qva composite has high userCount. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Sales-to-Price Mean Reversion: industry-adjusted SP z-scored
results.description: Target stocks with unusually high or low sales-to-price relative to industry, expecting mean reversion. SUGGESTION1 applied; field coverage high. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Earnings Momentum vs Share Count Changes: EPS momentum adjusted for share issuance
results.description: Control for dilution by penalizing EPS momentum when shares outstanding increase. SUGGESTION1 applied; chgshare field good coverage. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Momentum with Cash Ratio Safety: 3m return favoring high cash-to-current-liab
results.description: Prefer momentum stocks with strong short-term liquidity to reduce tail risk. SUGGESTION1 applied; cash ratio field coverage good. Confidence 0.62.
